00023     private static final class HumanBlocker
00024     {
00026         private final Semaphore readySignal = new Semaphore(0);
00027         
00029         private volatile int result;
00030         
00032         private volatile boolean moveRetrieved = false;
00033 
00035 
00039         public void setMove(int move)
00040         {
00041             result = move;
00042             readySignal.release();
00043         }
00044 
00046 
00052         public int getMove()
00053         {
00054             // Set that we've retrieved the move.
00055             synchronized(this)
00056             {
00057                 if(moveRetrieved)
00058                 {
00059                     throw new IllegalStateException("Already retrieved stored move!");
00060                 }
00061                 moveRetrieved = true;
00062             }
00063 
00064             // Wait for the move to be ready
00065             try
00066             {
00067                 readySignal.acquire();
00068             }
00069             catch(InterruptedException iex)
00070             {
00071                 throw new RuntimeException("Interrupted a thread... this shouldn't be possible");
00072             }
00073 
00074             return result;
00075         }
00076     }
00077     
00079     private static final Color [] coinColors = new Color[]{Color.WHITE, Color.RED, Color.YELLOW};    
00081     private volatile HumanBlocker currentBlocker = null;
00083     private GameStateModule game;
00085     private int MouseX;

00088     public Display()
00089     {
00090         setBackground(Color.GRAY);
00091         addMouseListener(this);
00092         addMouseMotionListener(this);
00093         setPreferredSize(new Dimension(500, 450));
00094     }

00097     public int getHumanMove()
00098     {
00099         final HumanBlocker ourBlocker = new HumanBlocker();
00100         currentBlocker = ourBlocker;
00101         this.repaint();
00102         return ourBlocker.getMove();
00103     }

00106     private Graphics2D setup2DGraphics(final Graphics g)
00107     {
00108         final Graphics2D g2d = (Graphics2D) g;
00109         g2d.setRenderingHint(RenderingHints.KEY_ANTIALIASING, RenderingHints.VALUE_ANTIALIAS_ON);
00110         return g2d;
00111     }

00114     private void drawBoard(final Graphics2D g2d)
00115     {
00116         // Get panel dimentions
00117         final int width = this.getWidth();
00118         final int height = this.getHeight();
00119 
00120         // Dimentions of the circles for a game.getWidth()xgame.getWidth() grid
00121         final double circleWidth = ((double) width) / game.getWidth();
00122         final double circleHeight = ((double) height) / (1 + game.getHeight());
00123 
00124         // Reduce the dimentions to prevent overlaps
00125         final int cW = (int) (circleWidth) - 2;
00126         final int cH = (int) (circleHeight) - 2;
00127 
00128         // for each column
00129         for(int x = 0; x < game.getWidth(); x++)
00130         {
00131             //for each row
00132             for(int y = 1; y <= game.getHeight(); y++)
00133             {
00134                 // Location of the current circle
00135                 final int cX = (int) (x * circleWidth) + 1;
00136                 final int cY = (int) (y * circleHeight) + 1;
00137                 
00138                 // Choose the appropriate color
00139                 g2d.setColor(coinColors[game.getAt(x, game.getHeight() - y)]);
00140                 
00141                 // Draw circle
00142                 g2d.fillOval(cX, cY, cW, cH);
00143             }
00144         }
00145     }
00146 
00148     private void drawOutlines(final Graphics2D g2d)
00149     {
00150         // Setup the brush
00151         g2d.setStroke(new BasicStroke(2));
00152         g2d.setColor(Color.BLACK);
00153 
00154         // Get panel dimentions
00155         final int width = this.getWidth();
00156         final int height = this.getHeight();
00157 
00158         // Dimentions of the circles for a game.getWidth()xgame.getWidth() grid
00159         final double circleWidth = ((double) width) / game.getWidth();
00160         final double circleHeight = ((double) height) / (1 + game.getHeight());
00161 
00162         // Reduce the dimentions to prevent overlaps
00163         final int cW = (int) (circleWidth) - 2;
00164         final int cH = (int) (circleHeight) - 2;
00165 
00166         // for each column
00167         for(int x = 0; x < game.getWidth(); x++)
00168         {
00169             // for each row
00170             for(int y = 1; y <= game.getHeight(); y++)
00171             {
00172                 // Location of the current circle
00173                 final int cX = (int) (x * circleWidth) + 1;
00174                 final int cY = (int) (y * circleHeight) + 1;
00175 
00176                 // Outline circle
00177                 g2d.drawOval(cX, cY, cW, cH);
00178             }
00179         }
00180 
00181         // Draw a line between the move selector and the board
00182         g2d.setStroke(new BasicStroke(3));
00183         g2d.drawLine(-1, cH - 2, width + 1, cH - 2);
00184     }

00187     private void drawMove(final Graphics2D g2d)
00188     {
00189         // Get dimentions
00190         final int width = this.getWidth();
00191         final int height = this.getHeight();
00192 
00193         final double circleWidth = ((double) width) / game.getWidth();
00194         final double circleHeight = ((double) height) / (1 + game.getHeight());
00195 
00196         final int cX = (int) (MouseX * circleWidth) + game.getHeight();
00197         final int cY = 1;
00198         final int cW = (int) (circleWidth) - 12;
00199         final int cH = (int) (circleHeight) - 12;
00200 
00201         // Get color
00202         g2d.setColor(coinColors[game.getActivePlayer()]);
00203 
00204         // Draw and outline move
00205         g2d.fillOval(cX, cY, cW, cH);
00206 
00207         g2d.setStroke(new BasicStroke(2));
00208         g2d.setColor(Color.BLACK);
00209         g2d.drawOval(cX, cY, cW, cH);
00210     }

00213     private void drawVictory(final Graphics2D g2d, final Point start, final Point end)
00214     {
00215         // Get panel dimentions
00216         final int width = this.getWidth();
00217         final int height = this.getHeight();
00218 
00219         // Dimentions of the circles for a game.getWidth()xgame.getWidth() grid
00220         final double circleWidth = ((double) width) / game.getWidth();
00221         final double circleHeight = ((double) height) / (1 + game.getHeight());
00222 
00223         // Get the first victory tile
00224         final int startX = (int) (start.x * circleWidth) + 1 + (int) (circleWidth / 2);
00225         final int startY = (int) ((game.getHeight() - start.y) * circleHeight) + 1 + (int) (circleHeight / 2);
00226 
00227         // Get the last victory tile
00228         final int endX = (int) (end.x * circleWidth) + 1 + (int) (circleWidth / 2);
00229         final int endY = (int) ((game.getHeight() - end.y) * circleHeight) + 1 + (int) (circleHeight / 2);
00230 
00231         // Draw a line through the victory tiles
00232         g2d.setColor(Color.BLACK);
00233         g2d.setStroke(new BasicStroke(10, BasicStroke.CAP_ROUND, 0));
00234         g2d.drawLine(startX, startY, endX, endY);
00235 
00236         g2d.setColor(Color.WHITE);
00237         g2d.setStroke(new BasicStroke(5, BasicStroke.CAP_ROUND, 0));
00238         g2d.drawLine(startX, startY, endX, endY);
00239     }

00242     @Override
00243     public void paintComponent(final Graphics g)
00244     {
00245         super.paintComponent(g);
00246         
00247         if(game == null)
00248             return;
00249         
00250         final Graphics2D g2d = setup2DGraphics(g);
00251         drawBoard(g2d);
00252         drawOutlines(g2d);
00253         // Draw move selector if there is a request for it
00254         if(currentBlocker != null)
00255         {
00256             drawMove(g2d);
00257         }
00258         if(game.isGameOver() && game.getWinner() != 0)
00259         {
00260             drawVictory(g2d, game.getStartPt(), game.getEndPt());
00261         }
00262     }
00263     
00265     public void drawBoard(final GameStateModule game)
00266     {
00267         this.game = game;
00268         repaint();
00269     }

00272     public void mousePressed(MouseEvent e)
00273     {
00274     }
00275 
00277     public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent e)
00278     {
00279         // Update mouse position
00280         MouseX = game.getWidth() * e.getX() / this.getWidth();
00281         
00282         // If this isn't a legal move, abort.
00283         if(!game.canMakeMove(MouseX)) return;
00284         
00285         // Ignore if there is no request
00286         if(currentBlocker == null)
00287         {
00288             return;
00289         }
00290 
00291         // Releases the blocker.  DO NOT REORDER THESE LINES!
00292         final HumanBlocker current = currentBlocker;
00293         currentBlocker = null;
00294         
00295         // Report Selection
00296         current.setMove(MouseX);
00297         // Update graphics
00298         this.repaint();
00299     }

00317     public void mouseMoved(MouseEvent e)
00318     {
00319         MouseX = game.getWidth() * e.getX() / this.getWidth();
00320         this.repaint();
00321     }
00322 
00324     public void mouseDragged(MouseEvent e)
00325     {
00326         MouseX = game.getWidth() * e.getX() / this.getWidth();
00327         this.repaint();
00328     }
